title: Find Mystic Carrion's Servant
content: ystic Carrion and free Thrumbo. If you aim to kill Mystic Carrion. You need to find all 4 jars of organs. Jar of Mystic Carrion's Lungs can be found in the Mortuary in the city's graveyard (X 27, Y 19). (Jar of Mystic Carrion's Lungs is on a table in the Mortuary.) From the Undercity Ruins waypoint and head west to the Passageway. Enter the Ancient Lair and lockpick the door with a DC 20 Sleight of Hand check. Looting or lockpicking will trigger a fight with a lot of undead. Jar of Mystic Carrio
